Articles.Content:
Hi all,

Sorry if this thread has already been posted but I attempted several shearch without result. Moreover, this thread 

don't solve my problem. Maybe because it's just for developpers... but I'm just and user without any knowledge in use of Unity and assets modification. 

This bug degrades my immersion so if someone could help me ?

Thank you in advance

Some type of mod...?

I have a feeling its the Sun...

On 10/14/2018 at 9:24 AM, LtWilliamManuel said:

Hi all,

Sorry if this thread has already been posted but I attempted several shearch without result. Moreover, this thread 

don't solve my problem. Maybe because it's just for developpers... but I'm just and user without any knowledge in use of Unity and assets modification. 

This bug degrades my immersion so if someone could help me ?

Thank you in advance

welcome to the forums! Is a part from a mod causing the issue? You might get a better answer if you ask in that mod's thread.

I already begun delete some of those I suspected and add them again one by one. For now, one reproduce my bug : DockingPortToggle. So in fact, even﻿ with your method, as it isn't a part which cause that, I wouldn't have find the bug like that. I'll continue to add the others one by one and test if another one cause the same bug ; but for now I would like to inform the developper of this mod. I said "would like" because when I shearch it in google, I don't find it. Maybe this folder was a part in the whole of an another mod. But for now I don't know what.
